title: Bucks and Warriors close out 1st Round series
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the series clinching win for the Golden State Warriors. Steph Curry carried the Warriors, but is there cause for concern for the second round? Find out where the Warriors need to improve to make it out of the 2nd round. Plus, Bucks blow out the Bulls to lock down their series. Giannis has worked on his game so much from last year that it has the guys singing his praises. Also, Doc Rivers wants the full story to be told about his 3-1 series collapses, but did he get the facts right? The guys have the receipts on Doc’s history. And it’s the NFL draft, who does Jalen want the Lions to pick with the number 2 overall pick? All this and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
